item.title: Amazon SageMaker
item.description: Community Resources Resource Link source https://aws.amazon.com/security/security-bulletins/AWS-2021-006/ Community Notes Source Note NCSC-NL CVE-2021-4104: Not vuln ; CVE-2021-44228: Fix NCSC-NL Completed patching for the Apache Log4j2 issue (CVE-2021-44228). Vulnerable only if customer’s applications use affected versions of Apache Log4j Sources Date Attribution Description 2021-12-20 12:37:57 NCSC-NL Updated vendorPatchExists.

Working to apply the patch to sub-systems that operate separately from SNSâ€™s systems that serve customer traffic.
